    Description
    AIChatController
    AI chat controller, responsible for interacting with different AI chat models (OpenAI, Deepseek, Gemini).
    ChatController
    Chat controller, responsible for managing contacts, displaying and sending messages, and receiving messages.
    ClassController
    Class controller, responsible for displaying and switching course lists, and theme switching.
    EditorController
    Editor controller, responsible for managing code/text editor tabs and file operations in the IDE.
    FileTreeController
    File tree controller, responsible for displaying and managing the file directory tree in the IDE.
    IDEController
    Main IDE controller, responsible for switching and initializing main interface modules.
    JeditermController
    Terminal controller, responsible for managing the integrated terminal in the IDE.

    Menu bar controller, responsible for handling menu actions and theme switching in the IDE.
    NoteController
    Note controller, responsible for displaying and editing markdown notes in a separate window.
    PDFReaderController
    PDF reader controller, responsible for displaying PDF files, navigation, and code block extraction.
    PPTReaderController
    AI-generated-content tool: chatGPT version: latest usage: we ask chatGPT to generate a PPT reader controller But we modify it a lot.
    ProfileController
    User profile controller, responsible for displaying and modifying user information.

    Controller for the student's course page, responsible for displaying announcements, resources, and assignments for students.
